parts.text:
❯ killall waybar
❯ waybar
[2025-06-24 21:18:08.432] [info] Using configuration file /home/curry/.config/waybar/config.jsonc
[2025-06-24 21:18:08.434] [info] Unable to receive desktop appearance: GDBus.Error:org.freedesktop.DBus.Error.UnknownMethod: No such interface “org.freedesktop.portal.Settings” on object at path /org/freedesktop/portal/desktop
[2025-06-24 21:18:08.434] [info] Using CSS file /home/curry/.config/waybar/style.css

(waybar:35914): Gtk-WARNING **: 21:18:08.434: Theme parsing error: style.css:32:20: Not using units is deprecated. Assuming 'px'.
^C[2025-06-24 21:18:10.972] [info] Quitting.

message.text:
❯ killall waybar
❯ waybar
[2025-06-24 21:18:08.432] [info] Using configuration file /home/curry/.config/waybar/config.jsonc
[2025-06-24 21:18:08.434] [info] Unable to receive desktop appearance: GDBus.Error:org.freedesktop.DBus.Error.UnknownMethod: No such interface “org.freedesktop.portal.Settings” on object at path /org/freedesktop/portal/desktop
[2025-06-24 21:18:08.434] [info] Using CSS file /home/curry/.config/waybar/style.css

(waybar:35914): Gtk-WARNING **: 21:18:08.434: Theme parsing error: style.css:32:20: Not using units is deprecated. Assuming 'px'.
^C[2025-06-24 21:18:10.972] [info] Quitting.

content.value: Refining question to improve search accuracy.

response.value:
The warning you see:
```
Gtk-WARNING **: Theme parsing error: style.css:32:20: Not using units is deprecated. Assuming 'px'.
```
means that in your style.css, at line 32, a value is set without specifying a unit (like px, em, etc.), which is now deprecated in GTK CSS.

To fix this:

1. Open `/home/curry/.confwaybar/style.css`.
2. Go to line 32:
      and
      (the second appears in the `button` selector).
3. Make sure all `border-radius` values have a unit, like `1px` instead of just `1`.

So, change:

```css
border-radius: 1;
```
to:

```css
border-radius: 1px;
```
Repeat for any other CSS property values missing units.

No Visual Studio Code setting or command is required for this fix. Just edit the CSS file as described.
